description: Students continue to develop the listening, speaking, reading and writing skills that enable them to deal not only with topics of daily life, but also cultural themes and authentic materials. Class meets four times weekly. Prerequisite: Japanese 112 or its equivalent. Offered annually in the fall semester.
name: Intermed Japanese I
notes: Students in Japan 231 must also register for one lab Japan 231AL or BL.
prerequisites: Japanese 112 or its equivalent. Offered annually in the fall semester.
